name: Shaymin
author: Hideaki Hakozaki
flavor_text: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.

poke_power.name: Celebration Wind
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Shaymin from your hand onto your Bench, you may move as many Energy cards attached to your Pokémon as you like to any of your other Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Bloom
attacks.effect: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokémon that has any Energy attached to it.
